Introduction
This topic contains information on SDP, including
authorization of SDP by a hub
confirmation of SDP status following a loss of entitlement
hub responsibilities following the authorization of SDP
, and
processing and controlling an SDP award
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section D - Processing Awards to Incompetent Beneficiaries
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section D
